description: composite purchase order with dereferenced/expanded orders fields

approved.description: whether or not the purchase order has been approved

approvalDate.description: Date and time when purchase order was approved

note.description: free-form notes related to closing reason

dateOrdered.description: Date and time when purchase order was opened

manualPo.description: if true, order cannot be sent automatically, e.g. via EDI

notes.description: free-form notes associated with this purchase order

poNumber.description: A human readable ID assigned to this purchase order

reEncumber.description: indicates this purchase order should be re-encumbered each fiscal year. Only applies to ongoing orders

isSubscription.description: Whether or not this is a subscription

manualRenewal.description: Whether or not this is a manual renewal

notes.description: Notes associated with the Ongoing order

reviewPeriod.description: Time prior to renewal where changes can be made to subscription

renewalDate.description: The date this Ongoing PO's order lines were renewed

reviewDate.description: Date when Order has to be reviewed

totalEstimatedPrice.description: total estimated price of this purchase order

totalItems.description: total number of items included in the purchase order

compositePoLines.description: a list of completely de-referenced purchase order lines

items.description: composite purchase order line with dereferenced/expanded orders fields

id.description: UUID identifying this purchase order line

checkinItems.description: if true this will toggle the Check-in workflow for details associated with this PO line

instanceId.description: UUID of the instance record this purchase order line is related to

agreementId.description: UUID of the agreement this purchase order line is related to

automaticExport.description: if true then line will be marked as available to export in the EDIFACT format or other format

alerts.description: alerts associated with this purchase order line

cancellationRestriction.description: whether or not there are cancellation restrictions for this purchase order line

cancellationRestrictionNote.description: free-form notes related to cancellation restrictions

claims.description: claims associated with this purchase order line

claimed.description: whether or not this purchase order line has been claimed

grace.description: the number of days after the expected receipt date during which claims should not be processed

claimingActive.description: Indicates if there is an active claim or dispute

claimingInterval.description: Specifies the time interval, in days, within which claims or disputes must be initiated

collection.description: whether or not this purchase order line is for a collection

contributors.description: list of contributors to the material

contributor.description: the name of a contributor to the material

listUnitPrice.description: The per-item list price for physical or resources of 'Other' order format

additionalCost.description: Lump sum that is added to the total estimated price - not affected by discount

discount.description: Percentage (0 to 100) or amount (positive number) that is subtracted from the list price time quantities calculation before additional cost

quantityPhysical.description: Quantity of physical items or resources of 'Other' order format in this purchase order line

quantityElectronic.description: Quantity of electronic items in this purchase order line

poLineEstimatedPrice.description: The calculated total estimated price for this purchase order line: list price time quantities minus discount amount plus additional cost

fyroAdjustmentAmount.description: Adjustment amount if rollover was happen

isBinderyActive.description: Indicates that this POL is designated as required binding

qualifier.description: Information about the binding, format, volume numbers, part of a set, publisher, distributor, etc. which might be enclosed in parenthesis

subscriptionFrom.description: the start date of the subscription

subscriptionTo.description: the end date of the subscription

donor.description: the donor contributing to this purchase order line

donorOrganizationIds.description: donor organization ids associated with this fund

activated.description: whether or not this resource is activated

activationDue.description: number of days until activation, from date of order placement

createInventory.description: Shows what inventory objects need to be created for electronic resource

trial.description: whether or not this is a trial

expectedActivation.description: expected date the resource will be activated

resourceUrl.description: Electronic resource can be access via this URL

fundDistribution.description: the UUIDs of the fund distribution records for this purchase order line

encumbrance.description: UUID of encumbrance record associated with this fund distribution

fundId.description: UUID of the fund associated with this fund distribution

expenseClassId.description: UUID of the expense class associated with this fund distribution

distributionType.description: Percentage or amount type of the value property

value.description: The value of the cost to be applied to this fund

isPackage.description: Indicates that this POL is for a package

locations.description: a list of the location records for this purchase order line

quantity.description: Combined/total quanitity of physical and electronic items

lastEDIExportDate.description: The last date when line was exported in the EDIFACT file

packagePoLineId.description: UUID referencing the poLine that represents the package that this POLs title belongs to

physical.description: purchase order line physical material details

createInventory.description: Shows what inventory objects need to be created for physical resource

materialSupplier.description: UUID of the material supplier record

expectedReceiptDate.description: vendor agreed date prior to the Receipt Due date item is expected to be received by

receiptDue.description: date item should be received by

volumes.description: list of volumes included to the physical material

poLineNumber.description: A human readable number assigned to this PO line

purchaseOrderId.description: UUID of this parent purchase order

receiptDate.description: date the purchase order line was received

receiptStatus.description: The purchase order line receipt status

renewalNote.description: Renewal note for this purchase order line

reportingCodes.description: a list of reporting codes associated with this purchase order line

id.description: UUID of this reporting code record

requester.description: who requested this purchase order line

rush.description: whether or not this is a rush order

tags.description: List of simple tags that can be added to an object
tags.title: tags

vendorAccount.description: the accound number on the vendor's end associated with this purchase order line

metadata.title: Metadata Schema
metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record (when available)

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record (when available)

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)

acqUnitIds.description: acquisition unit ids associated with this purchase order

nextPolNumber.description: Number that will be used next time a purchase order line is created

tags.description: List of simple tags that can be added to an object
tags.title: tags

metadata.title: Metadata Schema
metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record (when available)

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record (when available)

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)

needReEncumber.description: Indicates that order needs to be re-encumbered
